ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info.  I always like clearning up areas that are fuzzy.  I m changing the 32 mana song to this: Restores 7.3 mana/tick (tick = 6 seconds); Note:
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. I always like clearning up areas that are
fuzzy. I'm changing the 32 mana song to this:

Restores 7.3 mana/tick (tick = 6 seconds); Note: Multiple bards
singing DO stack :)

Thanks for the input!

- Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci) <forlorn>

> Being as I've revived Talies, I took a look at this, and all I can
say
> is.... wow ;)

> One small thing, however (and this may even be a revelation!) >
Apparently
> Bardic Clarity works VERY differently from enchanter clarity. This
> is the
> way that they stated it on the Forums:

> >Absor sez:
> >Chorus of Clarity is not a buff. Kendrick explained it:
> >"Chorus of Clarity is not actually a buff. To equate it to a
hitpoint
spell, it's similar to, say Healing, whereas Soothing is more like
Regeneration.
> >CoC gives the recipients a direct shot of mana every time the
bard song
pulses, unlike Soothing, which is basically a mana regen spell,
increasing
the rate at which you >regain mana.
> >See the difference?

> So Reed, the 32 song might need adjusting now ;)

> Talies the Wanderer
